graph_title: Proportion of poor population who receive social assistance, including family benefit
indicator_name: Proportion of poor population who receive social assistance, including family benefit
national_indicator_description: This indicator is calculated by dividing the number of beneficiaries, the recipients of social assistance (including family benefits) in the total population (or group) by the total number of population (or group).
computation_definitions: Social assistance - a set of social services provided to the family in order to prevent or alleviate the difficulties of life, to meet their basic needs, to integrate into society, as well as to prevent the difficult situation of life.
computation_calculations: The ratio of the poor receiving social assistance (including family benefit) to the total number of poor.
comments_limitations: The main source of information is an Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217).
source_organisation_2: Integrated Living Conditions Survey of households (ILCS)
